paramInformation.label: Night Light
paramInformation.description: When value =0 the LED indicator will be off when the the connected light is on, and the LED will be on when the connected light is off. if value =1 the LED indicator will be on when the connected light is on, and the LED indicator will be off when the connected light is off. if value =2 the LED indicator will always be off regardless of the load status

metadata.inclusion: Single click the button on the front of the IQ Outlet.
metadata.exclusion: Single click the button on the front of the IQ Outlet.
metadata.reset:
1. Unplug the IQ Outlet from the AC outlet and also unplug the power plugs of the lighting from the module (if plugged in)
2. Press and hold the button on the IQ Outlet
3. Plug the IQ Outlet back into the AC outlet with the button pressed
4. After 3 seconds, release the button. If you see the button blink, the IQ Outlet has been reset successfully.
